sources.name: MIMSExcel
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MIMSExcel

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared MIMSExcel_Nov30_2021 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://smpkpi.blob.core.windows.net/mims/Core_KPI_File_allloads_Nov01_2021_to_Nov30_2021.xlsx"),
  Excel = Excel.Workbook(AdfDoc),
  ExcelSheet = Excel{[Item=Excel{0}[Item],Kind="Sheet"]}[Data],
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(ExcelSheet, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = MIMSExcel_Nov30_2021
in
  Source;
